name: FoodPicker
0:
”Alexa ask food picker to pick a restaurant”
”to choose a restaurant”
”where should I eat”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: food picker
des:
This skill randomly picks a restaurant that's within a 3 mile radius of your device's location! Take the indecisiveness out of where to eat meals whether you're alone or with friends. Food Picker chooses where to go for you!

Please rate and review! Your suggestions will be used for future versions.

***This skill requires permission to access your device's full address.
